languages.text: И была рать великая, и были окаянные нечестивцы лишены живота во множестве, прочие же утекли борзо в пустоши, где и схоронились, устрашенные.
And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.
languages.original_text: И была рать великая, и были окаянные нечестивцы лишены живота во множестве, прочие же утекли борзо в пустоши, где и схоронились, устрашенные.

traits.locale_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.
And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.
And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.
And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.
And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

languages.text: Se produjo una gran batalla, en la que los malhechores sufrieron cuantiosas bajas. Los que quedaron huyeron a los yermos, donde se ocultaron, temerosos.
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: Se produjo una gran batalla, en la que los malhechores sufrieron cuantiosas bajas. Los que quedaron huyeron a los yermos, donde se ocultaron, temerosos.

languages.text: 于是一场大战爆发了。那些可憎的异端分子成批成批地丧命，其余的人迅速逃到了荒野之中，满心恐惧地躲了起来。
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: 于是一场大战爆发了。那些可憎的异端分子成批成批地丧命，其余的人迅速逃到了荒野之中，满心恐惧地躲了起来。

languages.text: そして激しい戦闘が勃発し、多くの異端の者達が命を落とした。残った者は荒れ地へと素早く逃げ出し、恐怖の中にその身を隠した。
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: そして激しい戦闘が勃発し、多くの異端の者達が命を落とした。残った者は荒れ地へと素早く逃げ出し、恐怖の中にその身を隠した。

languages.text: Und es kam zu einer großen Schlacht, und die verfluchten Schurken verloren in großer Zahl ihr Leben, und der Rest floh rasch in die Ödnis und versteckte sich dort angsterfüllt.
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: Und es kam zu einer großen Schlacht, und die verfluchten Schurken verloren in großer Zahl ihr Leben, und der Rest floh rasch in die Ödnis und versteckte sich dort angsterfüllt.

languages.text: S'en suit une grande bataille, au cours de laquelle nombre de ces maudits mécréants perdent la vie. Le reste fuit précipitamment dans les terres désolées pour s'y terrer.
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: S'en suit une grande bataille, au cours de laquelle nombre de ces maudits mécréants perdent la vie. Le reste fuit précipitamment dans les terres désolées pour s'y terrer.

languages.text: Ardından büyük bir muharebe patlak verdi. Lanetlenmiş kâfirler sayısız kayıp verdi, sağ kalanlar ise hızla çorak topraklara kaçıp korku içinde saklandı.
languages.original_text: And there was a great battle, and the accursed miscreants lost their lives in great numbers; the rest fled swiftly to the wastelands, there to hide in fear.

traits.locale_text: Ardından büyük bir muharebe patlak verdi. Lanetlenmiş kâfirler sayısız kayıp verdi, sağ kalanlar ise hızla çorak topraklara kaçıp korku içinde saklandı.
